Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.liberty-coal.com/about-us/. Richards Bay Coal Terminal (RBCT) is a major coal export terminal located at a deep-sea port in Richards Bay, South Africa

canonical_name: Rbct Richards Bay Coal Terminal Mine

web_search_companies.notes: Liberty Coal holds a 7.74% equity stake in RBCT and is involved in the operation and management of the terminal.
